item.title: SAS Programming Essentials
item.description: Getting Started with SAS Programming Chapter summary in SAS Working with SAS Programs Chapter summary in SAS Comments /* comment */ * comment statement; Accessing Data Chapter summary in SAS Accessing SAS libraries libref: library reference name (shortcut to the physical location). There are three rules for valid librefs: A length of one to eight characters Begin with a letter or underscore The remaining characters are letters, numbers, or underscores Valid variable names begin with a letter or underscore, and continue with letters, numbers, or underscores.
